metadata.dc:title: ESC guidelines on diabetes, pre-diabetes, and cardiovascular diseases developed in collaboration with the EASD. The task force on diabetes, pre-diabetes, and cardiovascular diseases of the European Society of Cardiology (ESC) and developed in collaboration with the European Association for the Study of Diabetes (EASD)
metadata.dc:creator: Sociedad Europea de Cardiología (ESC) y la European Association for the Study of Diabetes (EASD)
metadata.dc:source: Rev Esp Cardiol;67(2): e1-e56, feb. 2014. tab, ilus
